spells.name: Chameleon Stride, Greater
spells.description: As chameleon stride, but affecting all nearby creatures.

spells.name: Longstrider, Greater
spells.description: As longstrider, plus the speeds of other movement modes increase.

spells.name: Stench of Prey
spells.description: Predatory animals must successfully save or attack the target.

spells.name: Thorny Entanglement
spells.description: As entangle, plus plants make ranged attacks.
